name: upgrade-seat-routing.mermaid
content:
flowchart TD
  A[Pro user invites new Owner] --> B{Invitee has Pro seat?}
  B -- Yes --> C[Add as Owner to Account]
  B -- No --> D{Payer?}
  D -- Pro user self-pays --> E[Checkout -> seat -> grant Owner]
  D -- Under Org --> F[Account Manager allocates seat from Org pool]
  E --> C
  F --> C
  C --> Z[Owner can create/delete songs & invite]
